member.summary: Gets or sets the value that determines the display format of the text when the control is unfocused.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value for a culture to display the value based on it.

member.value: true if enable group separator; otherwise, false.

members.member: Display the parser content in double format.
Display the parsers content in decimal format.
Display the value with Percentage(%) symbol.
Display the computed value with Percentage(%) symbol.
The value will be updated once the control lost its focus.
The value will be changed for each keypress.
